divs: Sighting DetailsI was star gazing on friday July 13 when i saw a really dim light passing right over going strait north. The light was pulsating : from dim(about 5 seconds) to a really bright flash(brighter then any stars) to dim again and dissapear and start again the same sequence: dim. flash. dim. dissapear.Sequence lasted as long as i could see the light Look like a a satelite reflecting light (No satelite should of been there when i searched on my ipod app ''NIGHT SKY''.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Sorel
There were no other sightings in Sorel on or around July 13th 2012
